title: Soldering Competition - Day 3
description:
This is a smd hand soldering competition - the goal is to solder a Winkekatze with some LED lights in the shortest time possible. Every contestant keeps the board and the overall top 3 win a prize. 
Contestants are expected to have smd soldering experience - beginners will not be able to finish within 90 minutes. For more details check out the competition's website: https://handsolderingcompetition.de/
